title: Login and Registration Page Business Flow
description: Captures the flows related to user authentication including login, registration, and error handling.

steps.user_action: Click on 'My Account' or attempt checkout while not logged in
steps.expected_behavior: User is redirected to login/register page
User is logged in and redirected to My Account or last visited page
Error message is displayed and user remains on login page
Registration form is displayed with input fields

steps.user_action: Fill in registration details and submit
steps.expected_behavior: User is registered and automatically logged in if data is valid

steps.user_action: Register with an already used email
steps.expected_behavior: System prevents registration and displays appropriate error

steps.user_action: Leave mandatory fields empty and try to register
steps.expected_behavior: Client-side or server-side validation prevents submission
User is redirected to password recovery page

steps.user_action: Enter Login Name and Email for password recovery and submit
steps.expected_behavior: System sends password reset instructions to the provided email
